articles.title: ‘Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3’ Campaign Disappoints At Just 3-4 Hours Long - Forbes
articles.description: Given the extremely short turnaround time between the two Modern Warfares, yes, it seems a few corners have been cut, and the campaign is getting criticized for both i...
articles.content:
Modern Warfare 3
ATVI
As theyve done at least once in the past, Activision has allowed week-early access to the Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 campaign ahead of the release of multiplayer.
